questions_and_notes: Something wrong here.  Shouldn't the standard name be different from the one in the previous line?  Should it be volume_fraction_of_condensed_water_in_soil?  Shouldn't the units be the same as fldcapacity-Efx?  If it's the same standard_name, it should have same variable root name.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.

comment: Vertically integrated soil moisture divided by maximum allowable soil moisture above wilting point.
